column6: - Freed from their military prison, the X-Men race through the ruins of the city to rescue their teammates from a terrible fate! - Horrified by what mutants must do to survive, Kate Pryde and her family must struggle to find a way to save their people--and seek out the haven where a dire weapon waits.
column8: | penciller (cover):Art Adams | writer:Marguerite Bennett | artist:Mike Norton
